channel.title: Home page of Debamitro Chakraborti
channel.description: Recent content on Home page of Debamitro Chakraborti

item.title: RC Mini 5 - Day 1
item.description: 9:15 am I woke up at my usual time of somewhere-between-6:30-and-7:00. Thanks to my son I don’t need alarms! I headed out after an hour in search of Dr Strange’s Sanctum Sanctorum. I went to 177A Bleecker St - there was no house with that address. I was helped by an ☂ in my search. I took a photo of the shop at 177. Now I am about to head to RC after a small breakfast.

item.title: RC Mini 5 - Day 0
item.description: 10:57 am I am going to the Recurse Center. Can’t believe it yet. Right now I am sitting in the bus and heading towards Boston’s South Station. Two years ago my wife did a full batch at RC and that changed her life. It changed my life as well - I became convinced that RC was a “must-do”. It would not have been possible for me to do a full batch unless I quit my job, so my only hope was a half batch which lasts six weeks.

item.title: About
item.description: I am an amateur musician, professional programmer, as well as a husband and a father.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Does every programmer need to have projects on the side? That’s what the world wants to believe. Here are some very tiny and simple things I have tried. TicTacToe using reagent Generating MIDI files using C++11
